posts.post_content:
FS:  ppff - shipped

all SC.460.25 backs

Griffith - psa 1 $95 sold
Meyers PSA 3.5  $100 sold
Marquard ft psa 3 - $325 sold

I cannot believe I missed out on that Bender 

If deal falls through, I will take it

So on the Chief Myers - 

My checklist shows on only 2 Myers (Meyers) 

1st is Batting and the other is Fielding

This Meyers appears to be a Portrait.

What am I missing?

Additionally there appears to be 2 versions of each (Myers & Meyers)?

thanks for anything you can tell me....

[quote name="toledo_mudhen" post=2197605]So on the Chief Myers - 

My checklist shows on only 2 Myers (Meyers) 

1st is Batting and the other is Fielding

This Meyers appears to be a Portrait.

What am I missing?

Additionally there appears to be 2 versions of each (Myers & Meyers)?

thanks for anything you can tell me....[/QUOTE]


He has three fronts.

Fielding (Myers)
Batting (Myers)
Portrait (Meyers)

None of them are very tough.  None of his 3 poses have a spelling variation, they just finally spelled it correctly on his Portrait card in the last series.  I like Myers cards as an 'uncommon common', not a long career but one heck of a great player at the time his cards were issued.  Smashing .300 with ease when most catchers were absolutely terrible at the plate.
